label: AB2C3_oC96_66_ik_cdj2k_gl2m-001
title: $\gamma$-Li$_{2}$IrO$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
Li$_{2}$IrO$_{3}$ can be found in three structures (Choi, 2020): \begin{itemize} \item $\alpha$-Li$_{2}$IrO$_{3}$, which is isostructural with \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3C_mC48_15_aef_3f_2e-001}{Na$_{2}$PrO$_{3}$}, \item $\beta$-Li$_{2}$IrO$_{3}$, which is isostructural with \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3C_oF96_70_2e_fh_e-001}{$\beta$-Na$_{2}$PtO$_{3}$}, and \item the current structure, $\gamma$-Li$_{2}$IrO$_{3}$. \end{itemize} ~\vspace{-.25in} 
 There is no ICSD entry for (Modic, 2014), but they do provide their own CIF as part of their \href{https://static-content.springer.com/esm/art%3A10.1038%2Fncomms5203/MediaObjects/41467_2014_BFncomms5203_MOESM1029_ESM.txt}{supplementary material}.
